Literature.Title: In vitro activities of the lipopeptides palmitoyl (Pal)-Lys-Lys-NH(2) and Pal-Lys-Lys alone and in combination with antimicrobial agents against multiresistant gram-positive cocci.
Literature.Author: Kamysz W, Silvestri C, Cirioni O, Giacometti A, Licci A, Della Vittoria A, Okroj M, Scalise G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=2-16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=2-32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=2-32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MBC=2-32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=2-16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MBC=2-32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis VR(MIC=2-32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis VR(MBC=2-64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MBC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MBC=16µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=1-8µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MBC=2-16µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=2µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MBC=4µg/ml),Rhodococcus equi(MIC=2-16µg/ml),Rhodococcus equi(MBC=2-16µg/ml),Rhodococcus equi ATCC 6939(MIC=8µg/ml),Rhodococcus equi ATCC 6939(MBC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SAP 0017(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida albicans 105(MIC=64µg/ml),Cutibacterium acnes(MIC=1-4µg/ml)
